content: CPF PFF Panel 1 Seedly PFF 2019 Asked by AnonymousAsked on 02 Mar 2019Advices for self-employed/business owners? Advisable to contribute to CPF? 2 answersAnswerBump3
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Vincent Tan Wen Bin, Assistant Vice President at Thinkers AllianceLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 18 Jun 2019Yes. I do self contribute to my CPF as it will help to deduct taxable income and at the same time this will also help to build my retirement fund or I can also use those funds for housing.0 comments2

Alex Logan Lee, Director at Basic Models ManagementLevel 1. FreshieAnswered 3w agoYes, you should contribute to CPF as it gives you an added protection in the event your business goes south. And paying yourself a salary is also advisable as this is one of the important factors banks look at if you need to get a loan.0 comments0
